department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: standing Buddha on small lotus blossom; skirts of garment stick out on both sides--held in PL hand; red with gold in crevices, hair and garment trim; garment trim has floral details, highlighted with glass or gems; attached to black base

title: Standing Buddha
